alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schoharie; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Western Albany; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:50PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Gusty thundershowers will impact portions of southwestern Schenectady, southwestern Albany, southwestern Fulton, Schoharie, southern Herkimer and Montgomery Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 149 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty thundershowers along a line extending from near Clayville to Sharon Springs to near Gilboa. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Cobleskill, Canajoharie, Fonda, Jefferson, Berne, Mohawk, Frankfort, Fort Plain, St. Johnsville, Ephratah, Middleburgh, Gilboa, Summit, Schoharie, Richmondville, West Winfield and Sharon Springs. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 20 and 23. Interstate 90 between exits 28 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Montgomery; Schoharie; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Western Albany; Western Schenectady
